Uses of Class
fractal.RenderManager

  • Packages that use RenderManager 
    Package Description
    fractal  
    menus  
    server  

    • Uses of RenderManager in fractal

      Methods in fractal that return RenderManager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static RenderManager FractalChooserMenu.chooseFractal()
      Allows a user to choose a saved fractal and set zoom speed and resolution parameters

    • Uses of RenderManager in menus

      Methods in menus with parameters of type RenderManager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ExportImageTool.exportImage(RenderManager fractal)
      This method is where the actual menus and user interaction happens.

    • Uses of RenderManager in server

      Methods in server that return RenderManager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RenderManager Server.getFractal() 
      RenderManager Client.getFractal()
      Used to get the fractal the client uses to render
      Methods in server with parameters of type RenderManager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Client.setFractal(RenderManager fractal)
      Used to set the fractal the client uses to render
      Constructors in server with parameters of type RenderManager 
      Constructor and Description
      Server(RenderManager fractal, double zoomSpeed, java.lang.String directory)
      Creates a server using the given fractal, the given zoom speed, and that will save images to the selected directory
